Verses: 1 idho, Karththarudaiya Naal Varugiradhu, Unnil Kollaiyaanadhu Un Naduvile Pangidappadum.

2 erusalemukku Virodhamaaga Yuththampanna Sagala Jaadhigalaiyum Koottuven; Nagaram Pidikkappadum; Veedugal Kollaiyaagum; Sthreegal Avamaanappaduvaargal; Nagaraththaaril Paadhi Manushar Siraippattuppovaargal; Meedhiyaana Janamo Nagaraththai Vittu Aruppundupovadhillai.
3 karththar Purappattu, Yuththanaalile Poraaduvadhupol Andha Jaadhigalode Poraaduvaar.

4 annaalile Avarudaiya Paadhangal Kizhakke Erusalemukku Edhire Irukkira Olivamalaiyinmel Nirkum; Appozhudhu Magaa Periya Pallaththaakku Undaagumpadi Olivamalai Than Nadumaiyaththile Kizhakku Merkaai Edhiraagap Pilandhupom; Adhinaale, Oru Paadhi Vadapakkaththilum Oru Paadhi Thenpakkaththilum Saayum.

5 appozhudhu En Malaigalin Pallaththaakku Vazhiyaai Odippoveergal; Malaigalin Pallaththaakku Aadhsaalmattum Pogum; Neengal Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Usiyaavin Naatkalil Boomiyadhirchchikkuth Thappi Odipponadhupol Odippoveergal; En Dhevanaagiya Karththar Varuvaar; Dhevareerode Ellaap Parisuththavaangalum Varuvaargal.
6 annaalil Velichcham Illaamal, Oruvelai Pragaasamum Oruvelai Mappumaayirukkum.
7 orunaal Undu, Adhu Karththarukkuth Therindhadhu; Adhu Pagalumalla Iravumalla; Aanaalum Saayankaalaththile Velichchamundaagum.
8 annaalile Jeevaththanneergal Erusalemilirundhu Purappattu, Paadhi Kizhakku Samuththiraththukkum, Paadhi Merku Samuththiraththukkum Poi, Maarikaalaththukkum Kodaikaalaththukkum Irukkum.
9 appozhudhu Karththar Boomiyinmeedhengum Raajaavaayiruppaar; Annaalil Ore Karththar Iruppaar, Avarudaiya Naamamum Ondraayirukkum.
10 dhesamellaam Kebaadhodangi Erusalemukkuth Therke Irukkira Rimmonvaraikkum Samaboomiyaagath Thiruththappadum; Erusalemo Uyarndhadhaagi, Than Sthaanaththile Benyameen Vaasalth
